values.description:
Fieldhouse Yacht Surveys is a marine surveying company offering a range of sailing and motor yacht services tailored to the specific requirements of the boat buyer and owner.

All surveys and inspections are carried out in accordance with guidelines and standards set by the International Institute of Marine Surveying.

Fieldhouse Yacht Surveys is based in West Sussex, on the south coast of England. The communications network along the south coast enables fys to efficiently reach locations such as Dover, Ramsgate, Brighton, Littlehampton, Chichester, Gosport, Southampton, Cowes, Lymington, Poole and Bournemouth. We are also close to Gatwick Airport, enabling fast access to locations in the West Country and abroad. 

We undertake pre-purchase & condition, insurance and damage surveys on sailing and motor yachts, RIBs and sports boats of all materials.

Fully qualified Surveyor and Chartered Mechanical Engineer.

Pre-purchase, insurance and damage surveys of RIBS, Canal Boats, Sailing Yachts and Motor Yachts. All hull materials and construction types inspected.
values.name: Fieldhouse Yacht Surveys

values.description:
Major Medical Supply was founded in 1983 by a group of Colorado medical professionals and business people. Today we have seven locations in Brighton, Colorado Springs, Denver, Ft. Collins, Greeley, Longmont and Loveland and are currently serving the Colorado Front Range. Each location is locally owned and operated, guaranteeing the greatest flexibility and responsiveness in the market.
 
Our business philosophy is to provide a full line of home oxygen and medical equipment/supplies in each of our locations. Our focus is to consistently exceed expectations for quality, delivery, service, value, responsiveness, and professionalism. Major Medical Supply has made a commitment to exceptional, high quality service in the home medical products field.
 
Over the years, Major Medial Supply has become a leader in the medical supply and equipment industry. In ourbeautiful product showrooms, you will find a wide array of durable medical equipment, aids, and supplies. From respiratory equipment, mobility products, ambulatory aids, and aids to daily living, to compression therapy, incontinence products, maternity supplies, wound care, orthopedic supports and braces, and bathroom safety products - Major Medical Supply has it all!
values.name: Major Medical Supply

values.description: Since 2000, Carmotive, LLC has been selling clean, low mileage vehicles at Wholesale prices. We specialize in commercial fleet vehicles and ex-government vehicles. We are a small family owned dealership that focuses on the needs of our customers, and delivering a fair value. Located at 8769 Main St in Whitmore Lake, MI we are located just seconds off of US-23 in between Ann Arbor and Brighton.
values.name: Carmotive, LLC

values.description:
KAP Motor Group is one of the largest motor dealerships in the South East of England. We cover a wide range of services from new & used car sales to Motability adaptations.

We hold the Nissan, Peugeot, Renault, Subaru and Ford franchises and have a major Used Car operation with over 200 vehicles in stock and further access to literally 1000's more.

We operate an Alloy Wheel refurbishing department and here we not only cater for retail and trades customers we also work directly with the motor manufacture Nissan refinishing alloy wheels for the entire Nissan network in England, Wales and Scotland.

Our vehicle-servicing centres specialise in Nissan, Peugeot, Ford, Subaru and Renault and All Makes servicing and maintain/repair over 100 vehicles a day.

In addition to these we also carry a very large stock of tyres offering unbeatable value for money.

Other departments include a large Recovery division (AA Premier agents covering Channel Tunnel and Ports), Automotive Engineering specialising in engine reconditioning to the trade and retail, Crash Repair Centre covering from London to Brighton and approved by all leading insurance companies, a Vehicle Parts department who carry an enormous selection of Nissan, Ford, Renault, Subaru and Peugeot parts which are supplied world wide.
values.name: KAP Motor Group Ltd

This is a truly bespoke service, unique in the expertise, experience, value for money and flexibility it offers, available on-site in Brighton / London and 'virtually' anywhere

This is not an agency. This is service..

values.description: Eyes on Rosemont is a Complete Vision Wellness Center conveniently located on Brighton Avenue in Portland, ME. Drs. Tricia and Michael Pirone and our experienced staff will answer all your questions, explain every treatment option, and provide the highest quality eye health care available.  We also feature one of the most exclusive collections of designer eyewear that can be found in Southern Maine! Every pair of glasses in our optical boutique offers the very best in quality, style, and value, because we want our patients to look as good as they see in their new eye wear.
values.name: Eyes on Rosemont

values.description:
Founded in 1890 by Englishman, Alfred Grace Thompson, a saddle and harness maker, with a love for sport, A G Thompson Pty Ltd. began business in Bay Street Brighton Victoria, Australia and by WW1 was already entrenched as one of the leading Australian hand-made cricket ball manufacturers.  For the first 100 years of our existence, Kookaburra Sport traded as A G Thompson Pty Ltd and many members of the Thompson family are still involved in the day to day running of the company, looking to extend its award winning record as the world’s best known manufacturer of hockey and cricket balls.

The Kookaburra name is synonymous with Australian sport. Not only is Kookaburra Sport the largest producer of cricket balls in the world, our cricket bats and ultralight protective equipment is used by the world’s elite batsmen. Kookaburra now exports world wide to all cricket playing nations.

Kookaburra’s world famous Turf Cricket Ball has been used exclusively in Australia, New Zealand and South African Test Cricket since 1946.

Our Dimple Elite Hockey Ball is the only ball recommended by the Federation Internationale de Hockey and has been used in all Olympic Games from 1984 - 2008. 

Kookaburra continues to strive for excellence to be the best equipment for hockey and cricket both locally and world wide.
values.name: Kookaburra Reader Limited (Kookaburra Cricket & Kookaburra Hockey)

values.description:
Waldor Orchids has been a family-owned and operated business for four generations. We continue to provide the same quality and old-fashioned service that our customers have grown accustomed to over the years. Waldor is the largest provider of orchid

Waldor Orchids’ founder George Allen Off entered the flower business when he established Brighton Florist in 1925. His love of flowers and his desire to grow them would lead him out of his father’s hotel business and into the fascinating world of growing plants. To find out more visit www.waldor.com
values.name: Waldor Orchids

values.description:
We are an experienced, proactive and trustworthy firm of criminal law defence solicitors

Mackrell Marsh & Co solicitors are based in Brighton & Hove and has presence throughout Sussex and the South East. We are a friendly and approachable team working for you, with straight talking and no empty promises. 

As criminal solicitors we have experience of handling all types of cases from complex fraud, murder, to theft or public order offences. 

We are also expert motoring solicitors dealing with cases ranging from causing death by dangerous driving, drink driving, careless driving. See motoring offences
values.name: Mackrell Marsh & Co.

values.description:
Architecture & Interior Design

CDMS Partners Architects and Interiors is Camillin Denny Morton Scarr, located in the heart of Brighton and Hove.

The practice undertakes unique architectural projects both in the UK and internationally, combining innovation and progressive design skills with wide practical experience and detailed construction knowledge. Our work now includes public and private listed and conservation properties, hotels, museums and international masterplanning projects. 

Our aim is to produce beautiful, sustainable and healthy living, working and educational environments that demonstrate how good design is compatible with economic, social and environmental well being. We have won four Sussex Heritage Trust Awards in recognition of the creative integration of heritage properties with modern design and the sensitive use of local materials within our projects. Each project is assessed on an individual basis to determine the most appropriate sustainable design strategies. From inception to completion we will guide the client through the complex maze of alternative choices around sustainable design, to provide best value and lower running costs.

We are a Chartered Practice of the Royal Institute of British Architects (RIBA) and ensure our Clients receive the highest quality service through our Quality Management System certified to ISO 9001:2008.
values.name: CDMS Partners Ltd - Architects + Interiors

values.description:
Simply put, we are three photographers, backed by a panel of highly trained experts, whose professional experiences have covered, for example; Afghanistan, the Middle East, military embeds and commissions, both commercial and journalistic, involving extensive travel throughout many areas of the globe.

We have teamed up to create Risk Images. An operation with the sole aim of delivering to our clients, a versatile range of action based photographic services with the ability to operate anywhere in the world. 

Recent operations include work embedded with NATO, a photo assignment in Gaza, aerial photography of Brighton Marathon and a political demonstration or two!
values.name: Risk Images

We cover all aspects of business development from initial planning through to market research, sales strategy, marketing analysis, operations strategy and financial planning etc.

values.description:
Waverly Apartments is a 103-unit community featuring 2- and 3-bedroom apartments and townhomes. We are located in Brighton, MA.

Our community is near MIT, Harvard University, Fenway Park, the Arsenal and Watertown Malls, Boston Common Park and just five miles from the Back Bay and Financial District.

Our pet-friendly community offers controlled access, on-site laundry and a playground. All utilities are included in rent. Some units have wood flooring, washers and dryers.

Visit our LinkedIn Aimco company page for career opportunities at Waverly Apartments and other Aimco communities.
values.name: Waverly Apartments

values.description:
We are a Sussex based design and communication agency with heaps of experience in delivering innovative and engaging designs for a wide range of clients in the Private, Public and Voluntary sectors.

From logos, branding and campaigns to brochures, exhibitions and websites, check out our portfolio and if you like what you see, why not give us a call on 01273 483123.

In an industry where experience really counts, we maintain a close, friendly and trusting relationship with all our clients.

With a big perspective and a small talented team, we design for web and digital media, corporate identity, marketing campaigns, display, literature and newsletters as well as manage print and photography.

hrscreative started life in 1987 as Hill Rae Smith Associates Limited, based in a Victorian Hop Exchange at London Bridge. We relocated just outside of Brighton, East Sussex, to Lewes, home to the historic Lewes Castle, Sussex’s oldest independent brewery and the biggest and best bonfire night in Sussex.

Staying true to our London roots, we’re now based in the Star Brewery, a converted brewery in the heart of the town. Now an arts centre, we are surrounded by businesses involved in the arts and crafts, from illustrators to jewellery designers, guitar makers to architects. It’s a fascinating place to work.

hrscreative is headed up by Deborah Rae Smith, and managed by Clare Crouch.
values.name: hrs creative

values.description:
The decision to form the FWA was made by four journalists on board a ship in the middle of the English Channel on September 22 1947. The four were returning from Brussels, where they had seen England beat Belgium 5-2 in a friendly international, and are listed as Messrs Cole, Roy Peskett, Archie Quick, and Charlie Buchanan. The latter was the most famous of the four, having been an England international before becoming a successful journalist and founding the legendary Charlie Buchan’s Football Monthly.

Within a month they had formalised some of the rules and regulations for the fledging association, membership would be invitation only, to “working journalists who are accredited football correspondants for newspapers and agencies.” Headquarters were to be in London with the initial membershp fee set at five guineas for the first year, and two guineas annually thereafter – with an FWA tie included!

Membership of the Football Writers Association has continued to grow steadily, to around 400 with regional hubs in the north-west, north-east, Midlands and London. With the changes in modern-day journalism, FWA members now come from more diverse backgrounds rather than the once traditional newspaper reporter.

The Association has also needed to develop quickly in recent years, with on-line voting for Footballer of the Year now also available to members, while in 2011 the FWA relaunched our website to incorporate new social media platforms all of which help improve communication.

We remain proactive in taking up members issues with both clubs as well as the Barclays Premier League and Football League, whether it be over disputed access or press facilities, and the FWA also acts to guide clubs who are looking to redevelop their own stadia, with recent improvements at Brighton a case in point.

The FWA continues to openly recruit new members and welcomes any input as to how to make covering the beautiful game a smooth working environment for all.
values.name: Football Writers' Association

values.description:
MRL-V is an exciting new creation by the MRL Consulting Group. We are a team of experienced, passionate and innovative recruitment professionals based in the UK, France and Germany who have been working together for over 15 years. We have become a dominant recruitment player in several niche high technology and financial services markets across Europe.

MRL-V's principal aim is to build a highly successful portfolio of recruitment companies by leveraging decades of experience and our considerable financial and operational resources to either:

Partner with and assist recruitment consultants with strong potential to found and grow their own exciting recruitment businesses in international niche markets.

or:

Become a vibrant and supportive home for established recruitment businesses that are looking for enhanced, sustainable growth and immediate access to lucrative overseas markets.

With offices in London, Brighton, Munich, Dresden and Nice and a long and established list of highly satisfied key accounts in our chosen sectors, we know what works in recruitment.

With our innovative and flexible approach to partnering, we can help you to grow your business and sustainable profits at greatly accelerated rates and help your business punch well above its weight in international markets. 

Please do not hesitate to contact us if you think we can help you to achieve your ambitions.

info@mrl-v.com
+44 (0)1273 320860
values.name: MRL-V

values.description:
SIA Group  | "Asset Ingenuity"

A boutique asset valuation, advisory and disposal business providing asset solutions to a blue chip client base. 

SIA Group was founded as an asset valuation and disposal company in 2003 and has offices in London, Brighton and Bicester. 

We work on behalf of asset based lenders, banks, financial institutions, private equity firms, restructuring professionals, turnaround specialist’s, trustees, private companies and public bodies in the valuation and disposal of tangible and intangible assets.

SIA Group provides a comprehensive valuation and advisory service for all types of assets including aviation,  machinery & equipment, marine, property, receivables and inventory in a broad spectrum of industries. 

Areas of Expertise

Asset Valuations  |  Advisory Services  |  Asset Disposals  |  Asset Recovery & Storage  |  Aviation Valuation  |

Collateral Due Diligence  |  Corporate Restructuring  |  Sale of Assets & Businesses  |  Securitisation Reviews  |  

Discover how we can help you provide valuation advice for structuring your next transaction or help you achieve maximise realisation on disposal of your surplus assets. Contact SIA Group now: info@sia-group.co.uk or + 44 207 498 4900

address.street1: Regal House, The Hyde Business Park

values.description:
Ann Arbor Michigan's premiere PADI 5 star IDC Dive center. Helping people dive into a new adventure. Stop in and see what we have to offer. PADI, Handicap Scuba Association (HSA) and much more.

Valuable Training at a Great Value! We keep our classes small to provide personalized instruction and keep it FUN!! Make the most of your precious time with our convenient schedules at Ann Arbor, Ypsilanti, Saline, and Canton pools. A full range of PADI courses are available, including specialty training, Instructor courses, Technical diving courses, and more! Sign up for Basic Open Water Scuba Diver to get started.

Keep your Fins Wet! Our local Fun Dives, weekend Great Lakes dive trips, and group dive travel to exotic locations will keep you diving, and provide plenty of opportunities for meeting new dive buddies & learning more about the world of diving!

Gear up & Go! Our knowledgeable staff at our full-service retail store in Ann Arbor can help you select the scuba and snorkel gear that's right for you from all of the top quality brands in the industry.

Our Ann Arbor store is located just 10 minutes west of downtown Ann Arbor, Michigan and Briarwood Mall - convenient to the I-94 and M-14 freeways on Jackson Road between Wagner & Zeeb Roads. (Here's a map to the store.)  We're convenient for residents of Ann Arbor, Ypsilanti, Dexter, Chelsea, Saline, Manchester, Brighton, Howell, South Lyon, Whitmore Lake, and the extended Washtenaw, Livingston, and Oakland Counties.

values: PADI IDC Dive Center - Instructor Training
